creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: four wide horizontal bands--zigzag pattern in brown, black and gold metal on off-white; 3" plain off-white border at each end; three alternating bands with woven pattern in brown, black and gold metallic thread; 1/2" selvage on each side; entire design is supplementary weft
dimension:
83 x 52 in. (210.82 x 132.08 cm) (including fringe)
6 1/4 in. (15.88 cm) (fringe)
title: Wrapper
